## Description {#details}

Verify that the TBAA Metadatas are valid.

Definition at line 39 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/verifier-h">Verifier.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Typedefs

### TBAABaseNodeSummary {#ad0c97388ec16c5e1085504cf2faee1a0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::TBAAVerifier::TBAABaseNodeSummary =  std::pair&lt;bool, unsigned&gt;</>}>
Cache of TBAA base nodes that have already been visited.

This cachce maps a node that has been visited to a pair (IsInvalid, BitWidth) where

<code>IsInvalid</code> is true iff the node is invalid. <code>BitWidth</code>, if non-zero, is the bitwidth of the integer used to denoting the offset of the access. If zero, only a zero offset is allowed.

<code>BitWidth</code> has no meaning if <code>IsInvalid</code> is true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/verifier-h/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/verifier-h">Verifier.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Helper functions used by \\c visitTBAAMetadata.

### getFieldNodeFromTBAABaseNode {#a761c7aa6a0c33512e8eccee6fb5ca472}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MDNode &#42; TBAAVerifier::getFieldNodeFromTBAABaseNode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; BaseNode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; Offset, bool IsNewFormat)</>}>
Returns the field node at the offset <code>Offset</code> in <code>BaseNode</code>.

Update <code>Offset</code> in place to be the offset within the field node returned.

We assume we&#39;ve okayed <code>BaseNode</code> via <code>verifyTBAABaseNode</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/verifier-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/verifier-h">Verifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/verifier-cpp/#l07570">7570</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/verifier-cpp">Verifier.cpp</a>.

### verifyTBAABaseNode {#a83b2eb6f8379a16736577c5bfe052f7d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TBAAVerifier::TBAABaseNodeSummary TBAAVerifier::verifyTBAABaseNode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; BaseNode, bool IsNewFormat)</>}>
Verify that <code>BaseNode</code> can be used as the &quot;base type&quot; in the struct-path TBAA scheme.

This means <code>BaseNode</code> is either a scalar node, or a struct-type node describing an aggregate data structure (like a struct).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/verifier-h/#l00064">64</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/verifier-h">Verifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/verifier-cpp/#l07400">7400</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/verifier-cpp">Verifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
